website_summaries.verdict: A ducted wall-mount range hood designed for use with up to an 8.5-foot ceiling.
pros: Includes a 3-speed motor that is expertly constructed and runs quietly
Offers push-button controls for added convenience
LED lighting will continue to perform for an extended period of time
Comes with premium stainless steel filters
cons: Sheet metal on the back of the unit is loose and flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Horrific Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with Cosmo customer satisfaction. My unit was delivered without the stainless permanent filters making the hood completely useless. I contacted Cosmo customer service and respectfully asked if they would send me the filters that were supposed to be included in my purchase. All I got from them was a sorry and NO. Unbelievable customer service. Didn’t offer any type of remedy to fix the problem. So I now have a useless kitchen hood. Still can’t believe they wouldn’t attempt to fix their screwup.
customer_reviews.author: Tyra

customer_reviews.title: Hood Vent - worth an A+
customer_reviews.text: This hood worked out perfectly in design, function and quality compared to other high end name brand. Not to mention providing the same high cfm power. As all fans there is some sound (more like white noise) after all its pulling all the food smell out. I absolutely love it and at night with the light in kitchen whew it's beautiful. I'm in love.
customer_reviews.author: Sandyjules

customer_reviews.title: Great value product
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product. Pretty easy to install with the exception that the installation manual seemed to be for the higher priced model. The only negative is when turning on the fan in low speed, it initially kicks on in high speed for 3-5 seconds before slowing down into low.
customer_reviews.author: kristenh

customer_reviews.title: Just bought a new house
customer_reviews.text: The old stove vent was disgusting and did not work. So I bought this since it was very similar to the one that was already there. Easy to install, stainless steal is beautiful, came covered in wrapping that was a pain to take off but so worth it, fit like a glove, love the option to take out the vents so I can run them thru the dishwasher. Have no used yet, but have played with it The lighting is perfect, love the front lighting better then the back lighting. Typical noise level when put on high to get rid of smoke. Buttons are easy to use. It just overall perfect and exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Value and Quality Second to None
customer_reviews.text: We received our beautiful range hood a few days ago -WOW! We opened the well packaged box to a range hood that was beautiful, nice gauge stainless steel and details that range hoods two or three times in cost would have. The installation was pretty straight forward, but you have to really pay attention when mounting the three provided brackets to hang the hood. Once installed we're so happy with the results; look and function of the hood, bright lights,excellent fan,ease of access to filters and styling that goes with our other stainless steel appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Fan sounds loud but no air is pulled into fan...
customer_reviews.text: stainless hood, price was very competitive first time to see any stainless product price so low. works good so far and it was very easy installation. screw three screw on to wall with hook up kit and hook it on to kit. done. I have reduced the rating to 5 to 1 is that company had stated will give cooking glove however, company has not deliver a glove. I have contacted them couple times regarding ove however, not want to send it. Feels like company wants to bribe witb their gift to get good review after that, that not sending the actual promotioanl item As promised. That is not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Young O Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: Its a little loud, but does not bother us at all. Its not so loud that you have to yell to hear the next person. You just notice/hear the noise once its turned on. Other than that, it works beautifully like it should. The contractor had no issues with installation. It was very straightforward. Happy with this purchase. Even got it for cheaper as an open-box item
customer_reviews.author: Shobo

customer_reviews.title: Impresive Quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality, stainless steel, well package and the instructions for the installation very clear . Just what I was expecting, worst every penny spend on it. I recommend the brand and the product. Works smoothly, not noisy and the look a vert elegant line.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase but with a couple caveats
customer_reviews.text: This hood was good for us size and power-wise and I’m pleased with it overall so far (just out of the box and mounted). Two things that are drawbacks are the color temperature of the lights (bluish enough that food would look unappealing and potentially make it more difficult to judge browning accurately. Also, although the packaging looked intact, there are a pair of noticeable dimples right on the front edge of the unit, almost dead center on the leading edge to the left of the buttons. Nothing was visible under the blue film, but the issue is obvious without it. Not sure if it’s due to a manufacturing defect or handling during packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria-Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement Wall mount Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Wall-Mount Range Hood because the one I had died. I needed the 36:" to replace the one I had. It would have been easier to install without having to go through Cabinets like I had to do. It works as expected and is just what I needed to replace the 20 year old JennAir wall mount range hood. I installed it today myself (first time I have installed a Wall-Mount Range Hood & I have hope it will last for many hears. I highly recommend this wall mount range hood.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my new home because the builder installed the wrong one in my house. The builder swapped mine out at closing, so I returned this one (regrettably!) This one has some amazing filters that I cannot find anywhere else (baffles, very easy to clean!). And it moves twice the air with less decibels than my builders name brand. I plugged it in and ran a decibel meter, it was actually less than the spec sheet said it would be!
customer_reviews.author: T & K

customer_reviews.title: Good value; good performance
customer_reviews.text: The hood vent is a great value. The lights are great and we keep them on all the time for keeping some light in the kitchen. The lowest vent setting is a little louder than I would prefer but gets the job done. Mounting the shroud that covers the vent duct was challenging. The directions with the item and found online are not helpful for the use and mounting of the brackets to hold the shroud.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Amato

customer_reviews.title: and they are great. The higher CFM is so important when cooking
customer_reviews.text: Third one, and they are great. The higher CFM is so important when cooking. Price is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: benF

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Very good price compared to what’s out there. It is little on the loud side but it looks nice. Installation isn’t as easy as you might think. There is a small gash on the front of the hood which travels across one of the control buttons. I didn’t notice the gash until install and, by that time, it was a few days past the return date. Giving it four stars due to poor quality control (sending damaged product).
customer_reviews.author: M. Andy

customer_reviews.title: 3 months to receive a chimney extension
customer_reviews.text: If this product does not fit your kitchen ceiling height out of the box, stay away. I ordered a chimney extension on Aug 3, and every month the order gets "delayed" and they tell me to wait another month. Meanwhile my range hood has an incomplete connection with a hose duct hanging out. Had I known I was going to be without an extension I would have never purchased this product. A big waste of time. Cancelled my order and will throw their hood in the trash, where it belongs. I'll stick with more recognized brands moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Inspect Upon Delivery
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several of this style for houses I renovate. This is normally a great product. I did receive a damaged hood and it was outside of the return window therefore I am forced to keep it. The chase can be difficult to get inserted and lined up into the hood as well. I will continue to buy this product and do recommend it but inspect upon delivery in case it is damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah B Pierce

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, silent and powerful
customer_reviews.text: We love this range.We make a lot of Asian food on the teriyaki grill and stove. We were looking for a powerful, beautiful and near silent and after a lot of research we selected this hood and have to say that it worked for us. it satisfied our needs and have no reason to dislike it. it has 3 settings for fan so we use all three depending in the cooking we are doing. was easy to install and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Vik G

customer_reviews.title: looks nice and is light to install.
customer_reviews.text: I like this unit so far overall. As some people stated the low setting starts on high and goes down, annoying, but i was prepared. It seems to do a great job getting most of the steam, heat, and smoke out. I installed this over a commercial 36 inch flat top griddle. So to say it does a good job should mean a lot. My only complaint is the electrical. As you will notice in pics of product online no one ever shows the plug. There is insufficient room behind the chimney with 6 inch exhaust to install a plug and manage cord without trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Mama

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & works great
customer_reviews.text: I got this hood because it was the best-looking one on the market. It's not super quiet, but then again I guess no fan is. It works great, sucking the grease and smoke right out of my kitchen when I cook or bake. I also love that I can put the filters right in my dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Obbie1

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good price!
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly (2/2/2020) and in perfect conditions! Works great and has a low noise level. I had another brand and the highest level on this new hood is lower that the low level on the other brand. Powerful suction and bright lights enhance the cooking experience without the smell all over the house. Relatively easy to install, but the inner and outer boxes are a little tricky to install. A new a better design for the brackets needs to be developed. Overall very satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: ILIR SAKO

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works well
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this when we renovated our 1915 farmhouse. It was fairly easy to install, just not sure how everyone else was able to get the chimney all the way to the ceiling without scraping the ceiling... So ours has a small gap which is our fault. Everything seems to run smoothly and it suctions well. It is a tad bit loud but we usually have music blaring when we are cooking because we just love to eat! Ha haha! I posted a video that shows the fan on high, medium and low.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for great price
customer_reviews.text: Is great product was well packed very easy to install ( one friend recommended to used clear silicone for reducing noise from vibration I have to apply the silicone on back before install on wall) we loved great price an product
customer_reviews.author: Henry C.

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace another brand that had died. Cost much less than my previous brand but has better features and is much easier to use. Extremely easy to install, since I was simply replacing my previous one. The baffle filters will be much easier to clean, the lighting is good and the CFMs are higher than I previously had. I am really pleased with this range hood.
customer_reviews.author: Mudnpeg

customer_reviews.title: The sheet metal on the back which holds it up ...
customer_reviews.text: The sheet metal on the back which holds it up is flimsy. Even with 4 screws in the unit hung forward. I had to reinforce the tin at the edges from the inside to keep it from pulling forward due to the weight. The online directions did not show where the electric should be installed. This mattered as I was tiling my kitchen wall while I awaited the delivery. I sent email to Cosmo for this information and I never heard back.
customer_reviews.author: Krys

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I'm so impressed with this range hood (Cosmo 93190 36 inch). The value was so good I had to check the model number and specs several times before I was convinced I had the right one. 760 CFM for this price is amazing. Arrived well packaged and undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jamae

customer_reviews.title: Oven hood
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had a chance to install this item but it came well packed with no damage. Appears to be well made. I am looking forward to installing and using this item soon.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Bubonic

customer_reviews.title: Love this exhaust hood
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad to finally have a great looking hood in my kitchen. One thing that I really liked about it was that it could be used with a duct or used ductless as well as filters that can be washed in the dishwasher. Great product !
customer_reviews.author: lisa carson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vent hood especially for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy enough for one person and no extra help. Very well packaged and has a great finish and appearance. The low setting is so quiet you could walk away and forget it's running. This unit definitely moves a lot of air. I'll likely only be using it on low or medium in most cases and reserve high for only the most extreme cooking. Really shows how poor the over range microwave vent hoods are at clearing the air.
customer_reviews.author: Echosixx

customer_reviews.title: The bright led lights
customer_reviews.text: I love it. My only complaint is the bright white/blue lighting. The lighting comes off as a blue hue and not a warm yellow light. I'm hopeful I can change the bulbs. If so, it's flawless
customer_reviews.author: Amber Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, looks great, runs great.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and really works great. Prior to this externally vented fan we had a recirculating under cabinet fan that really did nothing to remove cooking odors. Now with this venting the smoke and odor outside we're back in business in the kitchen! Note that we had to remove a small under-utilized cabinet to accommodate this model and we haven't installed the pipe shields pending getting the wood trim touched up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the range hood.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Easy to install. I installed at 31 inches above range to get good head clearance. I'm 6ft tall. I have concrete walls so I had to burst a 6 inch hole in the wall with a hilti hammer drill. You have to purchase a vent for the outside wall separately.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great hood, useless  lighting
customer_reviews.text: Product looks nice and works well however the lights are a choke - no brightness whatsoever. Lights have not really any use. Fan works well.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Werber

customer_reviews.title: Price good, but...
customer_reviews.text: The item is good, but metal feels can of beer type, installation was very hard as it is not standard, and exhaust must be move up 6 inches, not an easy job.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco J. Russi

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I just put up the subway tile on the kitchen and took down the microwave so we needed a vent hood. I was nervous about installing and getting it up, bu you simply put the core mounting bracket up and then just mark everything else from there. Looks great too. I wanted it higher above the range and the max hight of 36 inches was perfect. In the picture I have not removed the protective blue wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and simple, gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my cosmo hood. sleek and simple, clean lines, adjustable install and simple intuitive buttons. I don't know what some companies think a range hood requires a touch screen. Amazing value for the price with commercial grade features. Absolute best for a home cook's kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and seems very well built. Noise level is good on lower levels but is a little elevated on high, nothing we can't live with. Moves a ton of air on all levels and the LED lights work great. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We chose this style because it fit our kitchen. We love that it was easy to install and the noise level is low. It works great for pulling up the steam while cooking. It adds the much needed light over the cook top.
customer_reviews.author: Lovie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I am in the kitchen remodeling business and this is probably the 10th hood I buy from them and they are just getting better and better. This product is very easy to install and their customer service is here in the US with great response.
customer_reviews.author: john cook

customer_reviews.title: Looks GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price and looks really good over the range. Packaged strong and did not have any defects or scratches. Did have to secure stronger to the wall and NO NOISE. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: J. Claypool

customer_reviews.title: Great range hood for value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased model 63190 35" wide range hood to mount over new gas range. Product shipped in very nice packaging with scratch preventative coating for stainless steel. We liked the push button features and easy fan speed adjustment. Low setting starts out fast but settles in a reasonable fan motor noise mode with filters assembled that we could not find on similar units which were loud. Other 3 speeds are available should higher drafts from the stove be required.
customer_reviews.author: Danney L. Ogle

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and SUPER easy to Install.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was amazing and all the parts were perfect. It was easy to install. Was a very good value. It really "Sucks" well (great velocity). Simple to operate. Like the cleanable stainless screens. May be back for a second!
customer_reviews.author: M James

customer_reviews.title: Great exhaust fan but
customer_reviews.text: The light is not nearly bright enough. This is a critical function for an exhaust fan. I am going to try to add adhesive LEDs to the exhaust fan to make it brighter underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super nice unit. Bought and installed after countless other options were reviewed. So happy with the look and functionality of it. Easy to install, our friends have purchased one too. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kohl F.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice
customer_reviews.text: This range hood looks very nice. I remodel houses so I will be buying for next house
customer_reviews.author: PaTriCk

customer_reviews.title: Filters are sold separately.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, the hardest part is peeling the protective film off the metal . Motor seems powerful, a little loud but I’m using it as a ductless unit right now .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Overall we love it! It’s exactly the look we wanted and the noise level is good! Easy to install even for homeowners. Kitchen still under construction in the photos
customer_reviews.author: sierra

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant with all the reviews and took my chances; it looks amazing, great quality, and I love that it doesn’t make a loud noise! Even when I set it to high; it’s still very smooth. Love love love it!
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: This unit is absolutely AWESOME, Quiet,works great and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: My complements to COSMO for the engineering and quality product they turned out here. It's very quiet (which was a concern as our semi-open floor plan warrants this. The looks are also great. Extremely happy with my decision and choice. Congratulation to all there.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence ackley

customer_reviews.title: buttons are bad
customer_reviews.text: sometimes buttons doesn't work has to be pressed many times to have it start
customer_reviews.author: Anjum Younas

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered extremely fast it was packaged well prevent damage very simple installation . I I have a second hood range inside my house from the same company would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: robert p rosen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Changed my down draft to an updraft and this was the perfect good.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Newsom

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works as expected. Noise level's also as expected, but one can always hope for a little less. So great to finally have a new hood getting all the cooking steam out of the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Orme

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful, quiet and well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Sleek and Shiny! It's beautiful, quiet and well worth the price. My husband and I remodel houses to resell and we will put this same range hood in the next house. Easy to install. High quality material! Love, love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve VanSickle

customer_reviews.title: great looking hood for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hood, looks great, great value, and was easy to install. my previous hood gave up and instead of just replacing we decided to replace it with the Cosmos chimney style hood. It made the kitchen look like brand new Not to mention the price, compared to other stores, this was by far the best priced one Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful products, the same value as some ranges that are easily 2x the price with the same identical function. Mechanical buttons are responsive and provide a positive feeling of activation. The finish is beautiful as well
customer_reviews.author: Allan Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: I like the plug in aspect so I did not have to hard wire. Cleans up unbelievable, turned my kitchen into a professional look. Not too noisy on high. Great LED lights, although I would prefer to be able to dim them
customer_reviews.author: Steve Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Great price, nice look
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to install, and a GREAT price compared to big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: MCB2020

customer_reviews.title: Clean Modern Look
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install with it being stand alone unit hung outside for a BBQ exhaust hood. Modern contemporary SS look pairs well with SS grill and rusty metal siding. Three speed fan is fairly quite and the 2 lights light the work surface well. I had no issue with hood rattle as others have complained about...with proper install there will be no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Smith

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product at Very Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: So pleasantly surprised by the level of quality. Exceptionally well made, packed incredibly well and delivered straight to my door. It was an easy install too! Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: joefitzmail

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with product.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging protected the item well. Tested fan and lights. Sound level was very acceptable...low speed seemed very quiet...high speed really moves the air and sound level is very acceptable...no rattling or vibration noise. Lights seemed bright...I prefer a well lighted range top...will have to see how well light is distributed once installed.
customer_reviews.author: KV - Columbia, MO

customer_reviews.title: Been Great!
customer_reviews.text: We've had it a year now, and it has been great!
customer_reviews.author: crjustice

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for price.
customer_reviews.text: It was a little tough getting the baffling in place based on a tight location but once it was in I thought it looked pretty good. The noise level is acceptable but it is a little louder than other range hoods I’ve had. Overall I think it was a good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Jayhawk

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased overall
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love our new cosmo range hood. We have a small kitchen in an old house that had no prior venting. It came fully intact and in perfect condition, the directions were very easy to understand, and installing it was easy as well! Very pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great good for a 1/3 the price at retail.
customer_reviews.author: Cod Family

customer_reviews.title: Great looking vent
customer_reviews.text: Great looking hood vent with grain identical to my Wolf and Viking appliances. It was much easier to install than I imagined it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, but the directions are lousy, very limited instructions.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: So far , so good. installed on a covered porch and looks amazing and works well when grilling.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy. Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected for the price. Looks great. Pretty easy to install. I modified the stack so it would fit in shorter/smaller space. Works great. No issues so far. Packed really well!
customer_reviews.author: Ed H.

customer_reviews.title: Broken in first month
customer_reviews.text: Has only been installed a few weeks and broken already, I am last return date so stick with a broken unfit. Also the chimney is too short for our ceiling height and have had issues trying to get piece needed to complete
customer_reviews.author: Hooked on Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I read reviews for the better part of a month before I finally purchased. Make sure you purchase the exterior vent piece, I bought a Nutone. It needs to be for a 6 inch opening. Overall, so far, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: price was good for a well build product
customer_reviews.text: nice edges and well built to bad the light wasnt as dim brighter would be better
customer_reviews.author: paul k.

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly
customer_reviews.text: Really good looking budget friendly kitchen hood,this is my 3rd buy since there's no complaints from clients, I'm really satisfy with the product
customer_reviews.author: kokaku kidotai

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Kitchen Hood
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful kitchen hood. Very happy with this purchase. Easy way to update your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Volley5

customer_reviews.title: Wear your ear plugs!
customer_reviews.text: WHile the cosmo hood looks sleek and modern and the price is right, don't waste your money doing this. The hood is so loud that it annoys while cooking! keep away.
customer_reviews.author: Real Estate Professional

customer_reviews.title: Love our Cosmos Hood Vent!
customer_reviews.text: We installed this in our kitchen, which we have almost completely remodeled. It adds a nice aesthetic touch while also keeping our kitchen free of unwanted smells. Installation was a little tricky but we are happy with the final product!
customer_reviews.author: Bianchi2325

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for your Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Installed it at my remodel kitchen and it’s amazing. It a little noisey on high but very powerful so I don’t mind it. I usually use it on low because it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Zaragoza

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: I love it !! The lights on it are great and The assembly was easy !
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jo MacLean

customer_reviews.title: Way too noisy fan motor is defective.
customer_reviews.text: The fan motor is making so much vibration I cannot use the fan. It was just installed this week and it is too old to be sent back. I am not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: mary rader

customer_reviews.title: Great range hood for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We love this hood! My husband and I do a lot of high heat cooking and searing, and this range hood has been a life saver! For the amount of air movement that it provides at that price, we couldn't be happier. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Draper

customer_reviews.title: Good product/clean lines
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for an outdoor kitchen. I needed to keep smoke stains off of the house and so far it is working out well. Its also nice to have a light over the grill.
customer_reviews.author: John U.

customer_reviews.title: Look and delivery time awesome
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived, have not had time to install. So far, love the quickness of shipping and love the look / style.
customer_reviews.author: Screamin

customer_reviews.title: Happy Owner
customer_reviews.text: The noise level is acceptable. The price for this 36" hood and other features was on point. More instructions could have been provided for installation, especially for the ductless installation.
customer_reviews.author: Earvin Echols

customer_reviews.title: Simple design, good quality, not overly loud, lights too blue/cold/bright
customer_reviews.text: This range hood is exactly what I was looking for. Simple design without a display on the front. Right price. The lights are very blue and cold which I don't love for nighttime lighting but good for visibility while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Installation was moderate easy. Noise level is moderate and understandable, but not quiet. Performance was somewhat disappointed compared to the number 760 CFM. Overall, quality to price was fine with me.
customer_reviews.author: TK Kwon

customer_reviews.title: great product for this price
customer_reviews.text: question, where to find the serial and product number to register for warranty. suggestion, can you please make the length of slightly longer, its not much worthy of such a short length.
customer_reviews.author: sg

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product it was easy to install. The noise levels are pretty low and it also has two built in led’s in it for extra light with 3 different fan speeds. I would totally recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Padamdeep Singh

customer_reviews.title: looks great!
customer_reviews.text: i haven't had much time to test it's durability yet but it's a nice looking hood.
customer_reviews.author: DoYouEvenPrime?

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Not noisy, good light distribution. Great product, especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Noise
customer_reviews.text: Good hood , gets noisy on higher speeds but for the price you can tolerate that.
customer_reviews.author: Bogdan Karashchuk

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money! Piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: Worst piece of crap we ever bought. We used it once and it was rumbling, it's flimsy and didn't work correctly. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Murphy

customer_reviews.title: motor on one i had went out cheaper to buy new one
customer_reviews.text: nice style led lights solid washable grease trap much better than mesh filters
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for cleaning the filter and the controls. My wife appreciated to have a good looking range hood. Thank you for the excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Philippe Gallant

customer_reviews.title: Cosmo 63190 36" Wall-Mount Range Hood is a hit!!!
customer_reviews.text: Visually, very appealing. "Eye Candy" Strong exhaust flow: 760-CFM Compared to similar range hoods on the market, price point is a good value. BONUS...Customer Service Support is responsive.
customer_reviews.author: DJM

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Used for outdoor BBQ under a patio cover and takes in all the smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We love it, the price is great and very sturdy we definitely recommend this hood range
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: This product fits well in our newly remodeled kitchen. Easily adjust the fan level (High, medium or low)
customer_reviews.author: EOS1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This range hood is just beautiful. Just waiting for the range. It is a great value for the cost. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to install, only took about 15 minutes. Looks great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Shields

customer_reviews.title: Very contemporary
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I'm impressed with the price and quality of this product. My wall is 10ft tall, and it's not too big nor too small. It looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: First One Junk
customer_reviews.text: First hood stopped working within 3 weeks of use. Company did send a new one. 2 weeks in and its still work.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz Shearrow

product_meta.title: Cosmo 63190 36 in. Wall Mount Range Hood with Ductless Convertible Duct, Kitchen Chimney-Style Over Stove Vent, 3 Speed Exhaust Fan, Permanent Filters, LED Lights in Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Style:Range HoodMake a style statement as you quickly clear the air of grease, smoke and odor to keep your home fresh and odor free with Cosmo’s COS-63190 modern canopy wall mount range hood. Experience premium brushed stainless steel built to withstand high heat, grease, oil and steam. Thick stainless is used all around to fight against accidental bumps and dents. Our wall mount range hood includes a seamless chimney set on all three sides for cleaner lines. Cook without unwanted odors and harmful air pollutants from disturbing your home. Contemporary styling is used for modern kitchen decors and an upscale luxury feel. Trust Cosmo for your next kitchen appliance.po
feature_bullets: EFFICIENT AIRFLOW: Featuring 36-inch size, 380 CFM and push-button controls, Cosmo’s wall mount range hood quickly ventilates your kitchen without the noise of competing range hoods. Optional Carbon Filter Kit available for ductless (Purchase Part # CFK1-TM)

EASY-TO-CLEAN FILTERS: Cosmo ARC-FLOW Permanent Filters are dishwasher-safe and extremely durable. No need to replace these filters, simply drop in the dishwasher for easy maintenance and cost savings
MODERN DESIGN: Modern styling to fit a variety of kitchen decors. Made of premium 430 grade, 20-Gauge thickness easy to clean brushed stainless steel
ENERGY-EFFICIENT LIGHTS: The energy-efficient, 2-watt LEDs are long-lasting and provide bright, high lumen lighting for better visibility at night

5-YEAR LIMITED PARTS: Our customer support team is based proudly in the USA. Product Dimensions: 35 in. (W) x 19.75 in. (D) x Adjustable 25.6 in. - 39.4 in. (H). Electrical: 120V/60Hz, 3-prong plug. Duct Size: 6 in.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars303 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
